title: ‘Our Depth Is Our Strength’: EF-Oatly-Cannondale Chasing Even Greater Success in Year Two
content:
U.S. team of Kristen Faulkner, Alison Jackson, Veronica Ewers clocked up a brace of fine results in 2024. New signings promise even more big results.

Read the full article at ‘Our Depth Is Our Strength’: EF-Oatly-Cannondale Chasing Even Greater Success in Year Two on Velo.
author: sstokes
